alert.note: Alert for Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 9:45PM CDT until March 23 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Sawyer County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Lac Courte Oreilles Reservation. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
